title: Chair, 1935
medium: wood lacquered black, leather seat and back
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Forsythe Sherfesee
description: This arm chair has a squared-off frame and a slightly raked back.  The chair's arms curve slighty upward towards the back.  The chair's members are rectangular in all sections and the entire frame is in black lacquer.  The chair's back and seat, slung from the frame, are of brown calf leather.  The seat and back are in reddish-orange leather.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chair, 1935.
1935. wood lacquered black, leather seat and back. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Forsythe Sherfesee. 1968-144-3.
